description:
In this time of uncertian business and economic conditions, there is the need to have a forsight in having a business of your own.

Many comapnies having a hard time giving the job security many employee hope for,thus it is important you start thinking of becoming your own boss. And one way to do that is by consulting.

Consulting is not as hard as many people take it to be. It is all about using your skills by providing solution to people's problems and then you get paid doing that.

In this course, you will be learning what consulting is,how to discover you skills,ways to harness your skills for consulting,setting up your consulting business and marketing strategies to promote your business.

This course contains 11 videos that last for 90 minutes. You would become a consulting expert after you might have finished this course.

So, come on board now.
title: Consulting Strategies: Succeed as a Niche Consultant
